pr_title: Remove unused environment from anomaly detector classes

timeline.bodyText: Intellij flagged this as a get on an optional without a isPresent check which is a very valid warning. In practice I don't think we could hit an NPE here but it shows the value in the inspections if you can keep the noise level down.
timeline.author: davidkyle

timeline.bodyText: nit: make it a single liner using ternary?
timeline.author: dimitris-athanasiou

timeline.message: Remove unused environment from anomaly detector classes
